directions: In a medium-sized mixing bowl, combine cream cheese, sour cream and taco seasoning. Spread this mixture in a 9-inch (or a little larger) round serving dish. Top the mixture with lettuce, Cheddar cheese, tomatoes, bell pepper and black olives.
ingredients: 1/4 head iceberg lettuce - rinsed, dried, and shredded
title: Taco Dip I
